problem_text: Classify the simple groups that are isomorphic to the multiplicative groups of finite rings, in particular, of the group rings of finite groups over finite fields and over Z/nZ, n ∈ Z. R. Zh. Aleev
answer: Such a classification is obtained in (C. Davis, T. Occhipinti, J. Pure Appl. Algebra, 218, no. 4 (2014), 743–744).
